channel.title: Adding pk points and custom crowns
channel.description: wonderin how i can add custom crowns for owners and pk points and pk point shop

item.title: Adding pk points and custom crowns
item.dc:creator: @Khaleed Khaleed
item.description:
@Khaleed wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:4, topic:315732”][quote author=Dj_Bigdadd link=topic=412197.msg3040424#msg3040424 date=1259080146]

try to get pk points code from a server and just do the pk shop
and the crowns you need go to client/sprites then there is a file named modicons0,1,2
0=mod
1=admin
2=owner
lol …

read what he said damnet he said custom…
[/quote]

2 is custom, but one issue, 80% of clients released, do not acually load that crown, most servers just do:

if (playerRights == 3) {
outwrite.byte(2);
}

to give playerRights 3 a crown…[/quote]
and maybe on some clients already have that with it :l

Read full topic
item.source: Adding pk points and custom crowns

item.title: Adding pk points and custom crowns

@sjoukjeowns wrote:

i’m pridy shure there is a tutorial about pk points and pkshops (rights to wield etc)
because alot of servers use it just google it or youtube!!

and the crowns you need go to client/sprites then there is a file named modicons0,1,2

[/quote]

read what he said damnet he said custom…[/quote]

2 is custom, but one issue, 80% of clients released, do not acually load that crown, most servers just do:

if (playerRights == 3) {
outwrite.byte(2);
}

to give playerRights 3 a crown…
